explanation: [0-0] A character in a blue bodysuit stands on a wooden bridge, holding an assault rifle. Facing them is a character in brown clothes. In the distance, there are mountains, trees, and rivers. White subtitles on the screen display "Auto Fire Setting" and a yellow emoticon.
[0-4] The character in blue opens fire, the camera pans left and right. The character in brown moves behind a wooden board, and the player aims at a distant mountaintop and shoots.
